page.title: 14Employment.
page.content: The pattern of employment in this area has changed a lot through the years.Most of the population now work in shops and offices,with British Telecom one of the largest employers. In past times large numbers of people worked on the land and by the river, boat building was a thriving industry. St Audrys hospital,formerly a workhouse also employs many people, as does Hollesley Bay Borstal colony. Many people now work in Ipswich and on the American Air Bases. In Woodbridge itself, principal employers are shops, banks, building societies, two boatbuilding yards and a small but growing micro technology area. {Kyson School.}
